words.id: Qâf||demi Al Qur'an||yang mulia
words.en: Qaf||By the Quran||the Glorious

translations.text: Qaaaf; wal-Qur-aanil Majeed

words.en: Nay||they wonder||that||has come to them||a warner||from them||So say||the disbelievers||This||(is) a thing||amazing

translations.text: Bal ajibooo an jaa'ahum munzirum minhum faqaalal kaafiroona haazaa shai'un 'ajeeb

words.id: apakah apabila||kami telah mati||dan kami adalah||tanah/debu||demikian itu||pengembalian||yang jauh

translations.text: A-izaa mitnaa Wa-kunnaa turaaban zaalika raj'um ba'eed

words.id: sesungguhnya||Kami mengetahui||apa yang||merusak||bumi||dari mereka||dan di sisi Kami||kitab||penjaga
words.en: Certainly||We know||what||diminishes||the earth||of them||and with Us||(is) a Book||guarded

translations.text: Qad alimnaa maa tanqu-sul ardu minhum Wa-'indanaa Kitaabun Hafeez

words.en: Nay||they denied||the truth||when||it came (to) them||so they||(are) in||a state||confused

translations.text: Bal kazzaboo bilhaqqi lammaa jaaa'ahum fahum feee amrim mareej

words.en: Then do not||they look||at||the sky||above them||how||We structured it||and adorned it||and not||for it||any||rifts

translations.text: Afalam yanzurooo ilas samaaa'i fawqahum kaifa banainaahaa Wa-zaiyannaahaa Wa-maa lahaa min furooj

words.id: dan bumi||Kami hamparkannya||dan Kami letakkan||didalamnya||gunung-gunung||dan Kami tumbuhkan||didalamnya||dari||setiap||pasangan||indah/bagus
words.en: And the earth||We have spread it out||and cast||therein||firmly set mountains||and We made to grow||therein||of||every||kind||beautiful

translations.text: Wal-arda madadnaahaa Wa-alqainaa feehaa rawaasiya Wa-ambatnaa feehaa min kulli zawjim baheej

words.id: pemandangan||dan pengajaran||bagi setiap||hamba||orang yang kembali
words.en: Giving insight||and a reminder||for every||slave||who turns

translations.text: Tabsiratanw Wa-zikraa likulli abdim muneeb

words.en: And We have sent down||from||the sky||water||blessed||then We made to grow||thereby||gardens||and grain||(for) the harvest

translations.text: Wa-nazzalnaa minas samaaa'i maaa'am mubaarakan fa-ambatnaa bihee jannaatinw Wa-habbal haseed

words.id: dan pohon kurma||tinggi menjulang||baginya||mayang||bersusun-susun
words.en: And the palms trees||tall||for it||(are) layers||arranged

translations.text: Wannakhla baasiqaatil laha tal'un nadeed

words.id: rezeki||bagi hamba-hamba||dan Kami hidupkan||dengannya||negeri/tanah||mati||demikian itu||kebangkitan
words.en: A provision||for the slaves||and We give life||therewith||(to) a land||dead||Thus||(will be) the coming forth

translations.text: Rizqal lil'ibaad, Wa-ahyainaa bihee baldatam maitaa; kazaalikal khurooj

words.id: telah mendustakan||sebelum mereka||kaum||Nuh||dan penduduk||Rass||dan Tsamud
words.en: Denied||before them||(the) people||(of) Nuh||and (the) companions||(of) Ar-Raas||and Thamud

translations.text: Kazzabat qablahum qawmu Noohinw Wa-Ashaabur Rassi Wa-Samood

words.en: And Aad||and Firaun||and (the) brothers||(of) Lut

translations.text: Wa-'Aadunw Wa-Fir'awnu wa-ikhwaanu loot

words.id: dan penduduk||Aikah||dan kaum||Tubba'||semuanya||telah mendustakan||rasul-rasul||maka pasti/berhak||diancamkan
words.en: And (the) companions||(of) the wood||and (the) people||(of) Tubba||All||denied||the Messengers||so was fulfilled||My Threat

translations.text: Wa-Ashaabul Aykati Wa-qawmu Tubba'; kullun kazzabar Rusula fahaqqa wa'eed

words.id: maka apakah Kami lemah||dengan penciptaan||pertama||bahkan||mereka||dalam||keragu-raguan||tentang||penciptaan||yang baru
words.en: Were We then tired||with the creation||the first||Nay||they||(are) in||doubt||about||a creation||new

translations.text: Afa'a-yeenaa bilkhalqil awwal; bal hum fee labsim min khalqin jadeed

translations.text: Wa-laqad khalaqnal insaana Wa-na'lamu maa tuwaswisu bihee nafsuhoo Wa-Nahnu aqrabu ilaihi min hablil wareed

words.id: ketika||mendapatkan/mencatat||dua pencatat/dua malaikat||dari||sebelah kanan||dan dari||kiir||duduk
words.en: When||receive||the two receivers||on||the right||and on||the left||seated

translations.text: Maa yalfizu min qawlin illaa ladaihi raqeebun 'ateed

words.id: dan datang||kepayahan/sekarat||mati/maut||dengan sebenarnya||demikian itu||apa yang||kamu adalah||daripadanya||kamu lari

translations.text: Wa-jaaa'at sakratul mawti bilhaqq; zaalika maa kunta minhu taheed

words.id: dan ditiup||dalam||sangkakala||demikian itu||pada hari||yang diancamkan
words.en: And will be blown||[in]||the trumpet||That||(is the) Day||(of) the Warning

translations.text: Wa-nufikha fis Soor; zaalika yawmul wa'eed

words.id: dan datang||setiap||jiwa/diri||bersamanya||seorang penggiring||dan seorang saksi
words.en: And will come||every||soul||with it||a driver||and a witness

translations.text: Wa-jaaa'at kullu nafsim ma'ahaa saaa'iqunw Wa-shaheed

words.id: sesungguhnya||adalah kamu||dalam||kelalaian||dari||ini||maka Kami singkapkan||dari padamu||tabirmu||maka pandanganmu||hari ini||amat tajam
words.en: Certainly||you were||in||heedlessness||of||this||So We have removed||from you||your cover||so your sight||today||(is) sharp

translations.text: Laqad kunta fee ghaf-latim min haazaa fakashafnaa 'anka ghitaaa'aka fabasarukal yawma hadeed

words.en: And (will) say||his companion||This||(is) what||(is) with me||ready

translations.text: Wa-qaala qareenuhoo haazaa maa ladaiya 'ateed

words.en: Forbidder||of good||transgressor||doubter

words.en: Will say||his companion||Our Lord||not||I made him transgress||but||he was||in||error||far

words.en: He will say||(Do) not||dispute||(in) My presence||and indeed||I sent forth||to you||the Warning

words.en: And will be brought near||the Paradise||to the righteous||not||far

translations.text: Wa-uzlifatil jannatu lil-muttaqeena ghaira ba'eed

words.en: Enter it||in peace||That||(is) a Day||(of) Eternity
